content: Matt, this is beautiful. Very well written. Though it points to a sad truth, that the Church has failed to rightly reflect the love of Jesus, I have found encouragement in the fact that He still chose to love us to the end, and give himself up for us. “Now before the Feast of the Passover, when Jesus knew that his hour had come to depart out of this world to the Father, having loved his own who were in the world, he loved them to the end.” -John 13:1 Thank you for publishing this.
